name: convert_hsl
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool convexity.
Tool description: Convexity is an Color-convertor API that offers endpoints for converting between different color representations, including RGB, HSL, and CMYK
API description: Converts an HSL color code to other color codes such as Hex, RGB, and CMYK using the Convexity API.

s.description: The saturation component of the HSL color code.

h.description: The hue component of the HSL color code.

l.description: The lightness component of the HSL color code.
